mainText: I am sad to know that Steve has left us. I use the products that he leads the company to create and produce. I am typing this email with a Mac Book. The spirit of his and of his company that he has delivered this spirit too, have already changed part of my life. He not only changes the world and he also changes our thoughts in a positive way - we can do anything if we are brave enough. When I see my Mac products, I will always remember Steve Jobs.
author: Kirsteen
